      • contentDuration

        public long contentDuration()
        Returns the preferred duration of a PAGMovie object which is used as a image replacement for this layer.

      • getVideoRanges

        public PAGVideoRange[] getVideoRanges()
        [Deprecated](Please use PAGMovie class instead) Returns the time ranges of the source video for replacement.

      • replaceImage

        public void replaceImage(PAGImage image)
        Replace the original image content with the specified PAGImage object. Passing in null for the image parameter resets the layer to its default image content.
        Parameters:
        image - The PAGImage object to replace with.
